ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class BidListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BidViewHolder>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.BidListAdapter

  • public class BidListAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BidViewHolder>
    For use with ViewBidsActivity Creates and manages Bid Views for the RecyclerView in the activity Defines Button functionality within the Bid Views Should be used with a scrollable LayoutManager which implements ScrollDisableable, though not totally necessary
    See Also:
    ViewBidsActivity, ScrollDisableable
